judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed. Costs on appellants.
Mr. Justice Roberts dissents for the reasons stated in his dissenting opinion in Sheldrake Estate, 116 Pa. 551, 551, 207 A. 2d 802, 803 (1965).
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: </. Brooke Aker, with him Harold J. Budd, for appellants.
Michael von Moschzisker, with him Martin W. Spec-tor, and Wolf, Block, Schorr and SoUs-Gohen, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Taubel Trust.
Argued April 23, 1965.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
</. Brooke Aker, with him Harold J. Budd, for appellants.
Michael von Moschzisker, with him Martin W. Spec-tor, and Wolf, Block, Schorr and SoUs-Gohen, for appellees.
June 30, 1965:
